~brushes,name: view_oob,View Order Of Battle,View this division order of battle online.
stance_1,Stance: Orders,This division will follow its move order regardless of enemy activity.
stance_2,Stance: Defend,This division will stay on the defensive if attacked before it moves.
stance_3,Stance: Probe,This division will stay back if its destination is occupied by the enemy.
stance_4,Stance: Support,This division will only move if there are already friendly troops at its destination.
stance_5,Stance: Withdraw,This division will only move if it is attacked.
